channel.title: Emmanuel MACRON on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Emmanuel MACRON
item.description: Emmanuel Macron President of France Small introduction on Emmanuel Macron and his involvement. It’s related to Jean-Michel HAYAT There is a dedicated website, Macron-Emmanuel.com, on which are published open letters addressed to the French President.
